item.title: Snap acquires Saturn, a social calendar app for high school and college students
item.description: Snap has acquired Saturn, a calendar app that helps students manage their school schedules and share them with others.

item.title: The startups rolling out of Europe’s early-stage micromobility scene
item.description: A handful of early stage micromobility startups out of Europe that are filling the gaps in a maturing ecosystem.

item.title: Startups Weekly: Fast and furious
item.description: Some startups accrued value at lightning speed this week, and we got confirmation that defense tech is red hot.

item.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
item.description: ChatGPT, OpenAI’s text-generating AI chatbot, has taken the world by storm since its launch in November 2022. What started as a tool to supercharge pr...

item.title: Character.AI taps Meta’s former VP of business products as CEO
item.description: Karandeep Anand comes to Character.AI with experience running advertising products that reached billions of users on Meta's apps.
